Package Model

Interface IMovable

All Superinterfaces:
IPositionable
All Known Subinterfaces:
IMotorizedVehicle, ITransportable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Car, CarCarrierTruck, FlatbedTruck, MANTGXD38, MotorizedVehicle, Movable, Saab95, Scania, Volvo240
public interface IMovable
extends IPositionable

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  IMovable.Direction
    Possible directions for movable objects

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    IMovable.Direction getCurrentDirection()
    Returns current direction of object.
    double getCurrentSpeed()
    Returns current speed of an object.
    void move()
    Makes object move in current direction
    void oppositeDirection()
    Turns the object around

    Sets current direction to an object.

    Sets current speed of object.
    void setX​(double x)
    Sets x position for an object.
    void setY​(double y)
    Sets y position for an object.
    void turnLeft()
    Makes object turn left depending on current direction
    void turnRight()
    Makes object turn right depending on current direction

    • setCurrentDirection

      Sets current direction to an object.
      Parameters:
      currentDirection - The new direction the object should face.

      Returns current direction of object.
      Returns:

      Parameters:
